DOCNAME: CASE OF B. v. THE UNITED KINGDOM (ARTICLE 50)
CONCLUSION: Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . ORG The case was referred to the ORG on DATE by ORG ( " the Commission " ) . It originated in an application ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) against GPE and GPE lodged with the ORG in DATE by a NORP citizen .

CARDINAL . ORG On DATE , the ORG constituted to examine the case relinquished jurisdiction in favour of ORG ) . By judgment of CARDINAL DATE ( " the principal judgment " ) , ORG held , inter alia , that the applicant had been the victim of breaches of ORG CARDINAL and CARDINAL § CARDINAL ( article CARDINAL , article DATE ) of the LAW by reason of the procedures followed and the insufficiency of the remedies available in connection with decisions relating to her child in the care of a local authority ( Series A no . CARDINAL-B , paragraphs CARDINAL of the reasons and points CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the operative provisions , pp . CARDINAL and DATE ) .

The only outstanding matter to be settled is the question of the application of LAW ) in the present case . Accordingly , as regards the facts , reference should be made to paragraphs CARDINAL of the principal judgment ( ibid . , pp . CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . ORG At the ORG ’s hearing on DATE , the Government of GPE ( " the Government " ) reserved their position on the applicant ’s claim for just satisfaction , which claim had not then been quantified .

In the principal judgment , the ORG therefore reserved the whole of this question ; it invited ( a ) the applicant to submit , within DATE , full written particulars of her claim ; and ( b ) the Government to submit , within DATE of receipt of those particulars , their written comments thereon and , in particular , to notify ORG of any agreement reached between them and the applicant ( paragraphs CARDINAL of the reasons and point CARDINAL of the operative provisions , pp . CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . ORG In accordance with the foregoing invitation and the President ’s directions , there were filed at the registry :
- on DATE , memorial of the applicant ;
- on DATE and CARDINAL DATE , memorials of the Government ;
These documents revealed that no agreement had been concluded between the ORG and the applicant .
CARDINAL . ORG Having consulted the Agent of the Government , ORG and the representative of the applicant , the ORG decided , on DATE , that there was no need to hold a hearing .
